info.title: Azure Log Analytics
info.description: Azure Log Analytics API reference for LinkTargets, StorageInsightConfigs and SavedSearches.

display.description: Creates a new workspace or links to an existing workspace by providing the customer id from the existing workspace.
Gets an existing workspace
Deletes a workspace. If the workspace was linked to an existing workspace at creation time then the workspace it was linked to is not deleted.
Generates Registration Certificate for the workspace. This Certificate is used to connect Microsoft System Center Operation Manager to the workspace.
Creates a new storage configuration. These configurations are used to pull data from a location in an existing storage account.
Gets a storage configuration.
Deletes a storage configuration. This will stop Microsoft Operational Insights from reading data from the storage account.

display.operation: Register a subscription to a resource provider.
display.description: Register a subscription to a resource provider.
Retrieves the shared keys for the workspace. These keys are used to connect Microsoft Operational Insights agents to the workspace.
Retrieves the shared keys for the workspace. These keys are used to connect Microsoft Operational Insights agents to the workspace.
Retrieves the list keys for the workspace. These keys are used to connect Microsoft Operational Insights agents to the workspace.
Retrieves the list keys for the workspace. These keys are used to connect Microsoft Operational Insights agents to the workspace.
Gets the names and metadata for System Center Operations Manager management groups connected to this workspace.
Gets usage data for a workspace including the amount of data read by the workspace.
Executes a search query
Gets the search schema for the workspace.  Search schema includes the exposed fields and their types.
Get datasources under a workspace.
Create/Update datasources under a workspace.
Get the user's notification settings for the workspace.
Set the user's notification settings for the workspace.
Delete Configuration Scope

display.operation: Get linked services under given workspace.
display.description: Get linked services under given workspace.

display.operation: Create/Update linked services under given workspace.
display.description: Create/Update linked services under given workspace.

display.operation: Delete linked services under given workspace.
display.description: Delete linked services under given workspace.
Lists all intelligence packs that are visible for a given worksapce and also lists whether the pack is enabled or disabled for that workspace.
Enables an intelligence pack for a given workspace.
Disables an intelligence pack for a given workspace.
Search using new engine.
Get search schema V2.
Search using new engine.
Get search schema V2.
Delete specified data from workspace

Lists existing accounts that are not associated with an Azure subscription. To link this Azure subscription to a workspace, use a customer id returned by this operation in the customer id property of the Create Workspace operation.
Get Metric Definitions under workspace

get.description: Lists all of the available OperationalInsights Rest API operations.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list solution operations.

value.description: List of solution operations supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

Operation.description: Supported operation of OperationsManagement resource provider.

display.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed etc.

operation.description: Type of operation: get, read, delete, etc.

customerId.description: The GUID that uniquely identifies the workspace.

accountName.description: The display name of the workspace.

LinkTarget.description: Metadata for a workspace that isn't linked to an Azure subscription.

Tag.description: A tag of a saved search.

category.description: The category of the saved search. This helps the user to find a saved search faster.

query.description: The query expression for the saved search. Please see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/log-analytics/log-analytics-search-reference for reference.

version.description: The version number of the query lanuage. Only verion 1 is allowed here.

tags.description: The tags attached to the saved search.

SavedSearchProperties.description: Value object for saved search results.

status.description: The status of a core summary.

numberOfDocuments.description: The number of documents of a core summary.

CoreSummary.description: The core summary of a search.

name.description: The name of the field the search query is sorted on.

order.description: The sort order of the search.

name.description: The name of the metadata schema.

version.description: The version of the metadata schema.

requestId.description: The request id of the search.

total.description: The total number of search results.

top.description: The number of top search results.

id.description: The id of the search results request.

status.description: The status of the search results.

startTime.description: The start time for the search.

eTag.description: The ETag of the search results.

sum.description: The sum of all aggregates returned in the result set.

max.description: The max of all aggregates returned in the result set.

id.description: The id of the saved search.

name.description: The name of the saved search.

type.description: The type of the saved search.

eTag.description: The etag of the saved search.

properties.description: Gets or sets properties of the saved search.

SavedSearch.description: Value object for saved search results.

id.description: The id of the search, which includes the full url.

SearchResultsResponse.description: The get search result operation response.

displayName.description: The display name of the schema.

indexed.description: The boolean that indicates the field is searchable as free text.

stored.description: The boolean that indicates whether or not the field is stored.

facet.description: The boolean that indicates whether or not the field is a facet.

ownerType.description: The array of workflows containing the field.

pre.description: The string that is put before a matched result.

post.description: The string that is put after a matched result.

top.description: The number to get from the top.

highlight.description: The highlight that looks for all occurences of a string.

start.description: The start date filter, so the only query results returned are after this date.

end.description: The end date filter, so the only query results returned are before this date.

SearchParameters.description: Parameters specifying the search query and range.

id.description: The Azure Resource Manager ID of the storage account resource.

state.description: The state of the storage insight connection to the workspace

description.description: Description of the state of the storage insight.

StorageInsightStatus.description: The status of the storage insight.

containers.description: The names of the blob containers that the workspace should read

tables.description: The names of the Azure tables that the workspace should read

status.description: The status of the storage insight

eTag.description: The ETag of the storage insight.

StorageInsight.description: The top level storage insight resource container.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of storage insight instances.

@odata.nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

StorageInsightListResult.description: The list storage insights operation response.

WorkspacePurgeBody.description: Describes the body of a purge request for an App Insights Workspace

table.description: Table from which to purge data.

filters.description: The set of columns and filters (queries) to run over them to purge the resulting data.

WorkspacePurgeBodyFilters.description: User-defined filters to return data which will be purged from the table.

column.description: The column of the table over which the given query should run

operator.description: A query operator to evaluate over the provided column and value(s).

value.description: the value for the operator to function over. This can be a number (e.g., > 100), a string (timestamp >= '2017-09-01') or array of values.

WorkspacePurgeResponse.description: Response containing operationId for a specific purge action.

operationId.description: Id to use when querying for status for a particular purge operation.

WorkspacePurgeStatusResponse.description: Response containing status for a specific purge operation.

status.description: Status of the operation represented by the requested Id.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group to get. The name is case insensitive.

WorkspacePurgeParameter.name: body
WorkspacePurgeParameter.description: Describes the body of a request to purge data in a single table of an Log Analytics Workspace

WorkspacePurgeIdParameter.name: purgeId
WorkspacePurgeIdParameter.description: In a purge status request, this is the Id of the operation the status of which is returned.
